member.name: T:MonoDevelop.WebReferences.DiscoveryProtocol
member.summary: Provides support for programmatically invoking XML Web services discovery.

member.name: M:MonoDevelop.WebReferences.DiscoveryProtocol.ReadAllUseBasePath(System.String)
member.summary: Reads in a file containing a map of saved discovery documents populating the Documents and References properties, with discovery documents, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas, and service descriptions referenced in the file.
member.param: Name of file to read in, containing the map of saved discovery documents.
member.returns: A DiscoveryClientResultCollection containing the results found in the file with the map of saved discovery documents. The file format is a DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoveryClientResultsFile class serialized into XML; however, one would typically create the file using only the WriteAll method or Disco.exe.
